actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-172, by Mr. Bonior.

Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 313 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Bill is closed to amendments.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 49.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 262 - 161 (Roll no. 230).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 313) to provide that the Defense Base Closure and Realignment Commission shall make recommendations in 1993 and 1995 for the closure and realignment of military installations outside the United States.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.J. Res. 313 (closure and realignment of military installations outside the United States).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 313) to provide that the Defense Base Closure and Realignment Commission shall make recommendations in 1993 and 1995 for the closure and realignment of military installations outside the United States.
